20-004EC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Ethics Commission Regular Meeting of Wednesday, January 29, 2020.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Jonathan Nagayama, City Clerk Specialist, spoke.Amy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Chair Wise spoke.Page 1 of 7411 W OCEAN BOULEVARD2ND FL CONFERENCE RM - THE BEACH, 1:30 PMTHURSDAY, FEBRUARY 20, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Chair Wise, seconded by Vice Chair Morales, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 4 - Kimmy Maniquis, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise2.
